timeline.bodyText:
When configuring timeout in code, please use
timeout(long duration, TimeUnit timeUnit)
or you need to name the method to be clear (e.g. timeoutSeconds) - in this case I would prefer the first one
If there is support for it in config, the configurable value must be timeout-seconds or timeout-millis and the code that converts it calls the method with TimeUnit)
